Class.ClassComment: MBean /** * Classes annotated with this will be exposed as MBeans. If you are looking for more fined grained way of exposing JMX attributes/operations, take a look at {@link org.infinispan.jmx.annotations.ManagedAttribute} and {@link org.infinispan.jmx.annotations.ManagedOperation} * @author Mircea.Markus@jboss.com * @since 4.0 */
